TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestWrapper extends System.Web.HttpRequestBase

summary.span: 封裝 HTTP 內建物件，此物件可讓 ASP.NET 讀取用戶端在 Web 要求期間傳送的 HTTP 值。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並可做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別並公開型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外部的應用程式中的類別。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

summary.span: 使用指定的要求物件來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified request object.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 強制終止造成任何待處理 I/O 失敗的基礎 TCP 連線。

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是安全執行緒。This method is thread-safe. 任何執行緒可以隨時呼叫它。Any thread may call it at any time.

summary.span: 取得應用程式根目錄的虛擬路徑，並對應用程式根目錄使用波狀符號 (\~) 標記法，讓此路徑變成相對路徑 (就像是 "\~/page.aspx")。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回目前正在執行的頁面處理常式的檔案路徑。The property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler. 當您重新導向要求，使用方法或方法，屬性會傳回您重新導向頁面的路徑 （子頁面）。When you redirect a request using either the method or the method, the property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於不同之處在於它也會將讀取的位元組複製到內部儲存體，供 ASP.NET 用來填入， ，和屬性。This method is identical to except that it also copies the bytes that are read to the internal storage that is used by ASP.NET to populate the , , and properties. 由於保留了這項資訊，ASP.NET Web Form 網頁 (.aspx 檔) 等下游程式碼將會成功執行。Because this information is preserved, downstream code such as ASP.NET Web Forms pages (.aspx files) will run successfully. 這不是使用 方法的情況。This is not the case with the method.

exception.span: 已載入並剖析要求的實體主體。

span.span: The request's entity body has already been loaded and parsed.

exception.span: 造成載入及剖析實體主體的屬性包含下列範例：

span.span: Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following:
- The property.
- The property.
- The property.
- The method.

exception.span: 若要避免此例外狀況，首先呼叫方法。

span.span: To avoid this exception, call the method first.

exception.span: 如果在讀取實體主題時中斷連接用戶端，也會擲回這個例外狀況。

span.span: This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.

summary.span: 取得可用來讀取傳入 HTTP 實體內容的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that can be used to read the incoming HTTP entity body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關要求驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about request validation, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用這個屬性時，您必須手動檢查潛在的跨網站指令碼攻擊的資料。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

summary.span: 會對透過 、 和 屬性存取的集合進行驗證。

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會使用輸入的驗證旗標來判斷是否要透過存取要求集合上執行驗證， ，和屬性。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法會設定這些旗標，當`get`存取子， ，或叫用屬性，會執行輸入的驗證。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 驗證的運作方式是檢查所有的輸入的資料，針對硬式編碼有潛在危險的資料清單。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
